solution_code:
def longest_substring_k_distinct(s: str, k: int) -> str:
        
        n = len(s)
        
        if n < k:
            return ''
        
        left, right = 0, 0
        
        character_count = dict()
        
        max_len = 0
        start = 0
        
        while right < n:
            character = s[right]
            if character not in character_count:
                character_count[character] = 0
            character_count[character] += 1
            
            while len(character_count) > k:
                left_character = s[left]
                character_count[left_character] -= 1
                if character_count[left_character] == 0:
                    del character_count[left_character]
                left += 1
            
            if right - left + 1 > max_len:
                max_len = right - left + 1
                start = left
            
            right += 1
        
        return s[start: start + max_len]
